references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 107.
example: Take n=3 say. The sum contains the terms 0 (once) from (0,0,0); 1 (6 times) from (+-1,0,0); 2 (12 times) from (+-1, +-1, 0); and 3 (8 times) from (+-1, +-1, +-1); for a total of 0+6+24+24=54.
author: E.V. Flynn (evflynn(AT)liverpool.ac.uk)
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Feb 05 2000
